verbs.description: [ARG0: Hillary Clinton] [V: excoriated] [ARG1: Trump] [ARG2: for his treatment of the media] , [ARGM-PRD: saying that press rights and free speech are ' under open assault '] . Bill was revealed to have made a conspiracy claim about her defeat .
